name: PasswordGenerator-Assistant
0:
”Alexa, Open password generator”
”Alexa, Ask password generator to generate a "five" digit "alphanumeric" password "with" special characters”
”Alexa, Ask password generator to generate a password without special characters”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: password generator
des:
You can generate a strong password with this skill enabled. You can customize the password requirements as well.
Control - 
1. Number of characters in the password (maximum 20, default 8)
2. Whether to include "Special Characters" (included by default)
3. Whether the password contains only numbers or only alphabets (alphanumeric by default)

How to generate a custom password? 

Generate + {no. of characters you want} + digit + {numeric/alphabets/alphanumeric} + password + {with/without} + special characters 

Sample phrases Alexa can understand- 

1. Alexa, open password generator -> generate a "five" digit "alphanumeric" password with "special characters"
2. Ask password generator to generate a "ten" digit password.
3. Ask password generator to generate a password without "special characters"
4. Alexa, open password generator -> generate "11" digit "numeric" password without "special characters"
5. Ask password generator to generate a password
6. Repeat 
7. Repeat again
8. Stop

Be sure no one is swooping/eavesdropping in on you while you are generating passwords.

That being said, Use at Your Own Risk

Disclaimer:

1. This application does not store the content generated for the user anywhere nor share any of the content generated with anyone.
2. By enabling and using this skill you agree that you are solely responsible for any outcome of using the password generated via this skill or using the app on its entirety. Amazon Inc. or the developer cannot be held responsible for any damages of any kind.
3. I do not make any warranties or representations as to the content of the App, the quality or availability.

priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
